DOC.brief_title: Study About High Fat Meal Postprandial Lipemia
DOC.detailed_description: Will recruit 60 woman age 19-40 year , diagnosis obesity ( BMI â‰¥ 30 kg/m2 ) treat obesity clinic State University Rio de Janeiro ( UERJ ) Brazil . Microcirculation parameter blood test assess baseline , woman receive high-fat meal contain croissant , salami , whole milk cheddar cheese . After 30 , 60 , 120 180 minute meal microcirculation evaluate well blood collection .
DOC.criteria: patient obesity class I ( BMI 30 35kg/m2 ) ; Submit diabetes mellitus without treatment obese nondiabetic glucose intolerant ; Presenting age 19 40 year . Waist circumference > 80 cm ( IDF ) Renal disease , coronary peripheral vascular , hematologic hepatic impairment ; Presence dyslipidemia ; smoker ; Significant loss body weight six month prior study .
